name: Fragments from Our Good Old Days #00
description: Live visual for ❒ 神經博士、玩吉他的男孩們、文山変電所 ❒ at Revolver. The cubes' movement was driven by experimental music made by my friends. The sound wasn't recorded. Only these bouncing cubes help me reminisce the good old days. In the end I didn't use them in the performance, though. I'd like to put this piece on to the internet so they won't just sleep in my usb drive forever.
